sentences.sContent: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.sCn: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.sContent: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.sCn: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

sentences.sContent: ...yesterday I finally got around to that new barbershop in the mall and enjoyedtheir services...

synos.tran: 购物商场；[建]林荫路；铁圈球场

phrases.pCn: 逛商厦迷；爱逛商店的年轻人
